item.title: Apple rival Honor launches AI phone tools that help users get online shopping discounts and more
item.description: Honor expects people will turn more to AI assistants rather than smartphone apps directly, President of Products Fei Fang told CNBC in an exclusive in...

item.title: Honor reveals a new smartphone with a fold-out robotic camera arm
item.description: Chinese smartphone company Honor said it would release more details about the artificial intelligence-powered robot phone next year.

item.title: Morgan Stanley posts massive third-quarter earnings beat
item.description: Wall Street-centric banks like Morgan Stanley and peer Goldman Sachs are in an ideal moneymaking environment.

item.title: Bank of America tops expectations on 43% surge in investment banking revenue
item.description: Like its peers, Bank of America's Wall Street businesses helped fuel the quarter's results.
